name: modern-chat-card
author: alirezazim03
preview: A modern chat card component with illustration and call-to-action buttons

props.name: title
props.description: Main title text displayed on the card

props.name: description
props.description: Description text displayed below the title

props.name: primaryButtonText
props.description: Text for the primary action button

props.name: secondaryButtonText
props.description: Text for the secondary action button

props.name: onPrimaryClick
props.description: Callback function when primary button is clicked

props.name: onSecondaryClick
props.description: Callback function when secondary button is clicked

props.name: imageUrl
props.description: URL for the card's header image
